languages.text: "Для ритуала требуется особое место, насыщенное силами самого Кетца Темера — сердце нашей деревни. И жрец, что сей ритуал проведет. К сожалению, огненный дождь, насланный духами-из-тьмы, погубил множество подвластных этой правительнице жрецов. И теперь племени этой правительницы остается лишь уповать на милость Бога-орла и его Звездорожденных посланников".

traits.locale_text: "Для ритуала требуется особое место, насыщенное силами самого Кетца Темера — сердце нашей деревни. И жрец, что сей ритуал проведет. К сожалению, огненный дождь, насланный духами-из-тьмы, погубил множество подвластных этой правительнице жрецов. И теперь племени этой правительницы остается лишь уповать на милость Бога-орла и его Звездорожденных посланников".

languages.text: "The ritual requires a site imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — and a priest to perform it. Alas, the fire-rain claimed many of this ruler's priests. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and His Starborn Sky-Heralds."
languages.original_text: "Для ритуала требуется особое место, насыщенное силами самого Кетца Темера — сердце нашей деревни. И жрец, что сей ритуал проведет. К сожалению, огненный дождь, насланный духами-из-тьмы, погубил множество подвластных этой правительнице жрецов. И теперь племени этой правительницы остается лишь уповать на милость Бога-орла и его Звездорожденных посланников".

traits.locale_text: "A special place imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — is required to conduct the ritual. As well as a priest who can conduct said ritual. Sadly, the rain of fire had killed many of the priests that were this ruler's subjects. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and his Starborn Heavenly Envoys."

"A special place imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — is required to conduct the ritual. As well as a priest who can conduct said ritual. Sadly, the rain of fire had killed many of the priests that were this ruler's subjects. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and his Starborn Heavenly Envoys."

"A special place imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — is required to conduct the ritual. As well as a priest who can conduct said ritual. Sadly, the rain of fire had killed many of the priests that were this ruler's subjects. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and his Starborn Heavenly Envoys."

"A special place imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — is required to conduct the ritual. As well as a priest who can conduct said ritual. Sadly, the rain of fire had killed many of the priests that were this ruler's subjects. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and his Starborn Heavenly Envoys."

"The ritual requires a site imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — and a priest to perform it. Alas, the fire-rain claimed many of this ruler's priests. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and His Starborn Sky-Heralds."

"The ritual requires a site imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — and a priest to perform it. Alas, the fire-rain claimed many of this ruler's priests. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and His Starborn Sky-Heralds."

languages.text: «Para el ritual se necesita un lugar especial imbuido de los poderes de Quetza Temer: el corazón de nuestra aldea. Y también un sacerdote que sepa oficiar dicho ritual. Por desgracia, la lluvia de fuego se cobró las vidas de muchos de los sacerdotes de esta jefa. Y por eso la tribu de esta jefa reza para que el Dios Águila y sus Emisarios Celestiales, los Hijos de las Estrellas, sean misericordiosos».
languages.original_text: "The ritual requires a site imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — and a priest to perform it. Alas, the fire-rain claimed many of this ruler's priests. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and His Starborn Sky-Heralds."

traits.locale_text: «Para llevar a cabo el ritual se necesita un lugar especial imbuido de los poderes de Quetza Temer: el corazón de nuestra aldea. Y también un sacerdote que sepa oficiar dicho ritual. Por desgracia, la lluvia de fuego mató a muchos de los sacerdotes súbditos de esta jefa. Y por eso la tribu de esta jefa reza para que el Dios Águila y sus Emisarios Celestiales, los Hijos de las Estrellas, sean misericordiosos».

languages.text: “若要举行仪式，需要前往格扎尔特默能量汇聚的特殊之所，比如村子的中心，还需要主持仪式的祭司。遗憾的是，一场倾盆火雨杀死了此酋长的许多祭司。此酋长的部落只能祈求鹰神和祂的星裔圣使能平息怒火，得到宽恕。”
languages.original_text: "The ritual requires a site imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — and a priest to perform it. Alas, the fire-rain claimed many of this ruler's priests. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and His Starborn Sky-Heralds."

traits.locale_text: “若要举行仪式，需要前往格扎尔特默能量汇聚的特殊之所，比如我们村庄的中心。除此之外，还得有能主持仪式的祭司。遗憾的是，一场倾盆火雨杀死了此酋长的许多祭司与臣民。此酋长的部落只能祈求鹰神和他的星裔天使能平息怒火，施以宽恕。”

languages.text: « Le rituel doit être effectué dans un lieu imprégné de la puissance de Quetza Temer : le centre de notre village. Il faut aussi un prêtre capable de l'accomplir. Malheureusement, la pluie de feu a tué un grand nombre des prêtres qui appartenaient à cette tribu. Nous ne pouvons donc qu'implorer la clémence de l'Aigle-Dieu et de Ses émissaires célestes. »
languages.original_text: "The ritual requires a site imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — and a priest to perform it. Alas, the fire-rain claimed many of this ruler's priests. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and His Starborn Sky-Heralds."

traits.locale_text: « Le rituel doit être effectué dans un lieu imprégné de la puissance de Quetza Temer : le centre de notre village. Il faut aussi un prêtre capable de l'accomplir. Malheureusement, la pluie de feu a tué un grand nombre des prêtres qui appartenaient à cette tribu. Nous ne pouvons donc qu'implorer la clémence de l'Aigle-Dieu et de Ses émissaires célestes. »

languages.text: 「儀式を行うには、ケツァ・テメルの力が宿った特別な場所…つまり私たちの村の中心が必要です。そして、その儀式を執り行うことのできる司祭も必要です。悲しいことに、炎の雨は、この支配者の臣下たる司祭の多くを殺してしまいました。ゆえに、この支配者の部族は、鷲神とスターボーンの天の先駆者の慈悲を祈るしかないのです」
languages.original_text: "The ritual requires a site imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — and a priest to perform it. Alas, the fire-rain claimed many of this ruler's priests. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and His Starborn Sky-Heralds."

traits.locale_text: 「儀式を行うには、ケツァ・テメルの力が宿った特別な場所…つまり私たちの村の中心が必要です。そして、その儀式を執り行うことのできる司祭も必要です。悲しいことに、炎の雨は、この支配者の臣下たる司祭の多くを殺してしまいました。ゆえに、この支配者の部族は、鷲神とスターボーンの天の先駆者の慈悲を祈るしかないのです」

languages.text: "Das Ritual erfordert eine Stätte, die von der Macht von Quetza Temer beseelt ist ... das Herz unseres Dorfs ... und einen Priester, der es durchführt. Leider hat der Feuerregen viele Priester dieser Herrscherin getötet. Und so kann der Stamm dieser Herrscherin nur um die Gnade des Adler-Gottes und Seiner sternengeborenen Herolde bitten."
languages.original_text: "The ritual requires a site imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — and a priest to perform it. Alas, the fire-rain claimed many of this ruler's priests. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and His Starborn Sky-Heralds."

traits.locale_text: "Um das Ritual durchzuführen, ist ein ganz besonderer Ort nötig, der mit den Mächten von Quetza Temer getränkt ist — das Herz des Dorfs. Außerdem ein Priester, der das besagte Ritual durchführen kann. Bedauerlicherweise hat der Feuerregen viele der Priester getötet, welche die Untertanen dieser Herrscherin waren. Und so kann der Stamm dieser Herrscherin nur um die Gnade des Adler-Gottes und seiner sternengeborenen himmlischen Gesandten beten."

languages.text: "Ayinin Quetza Temer'in güçleriyle dolu bir alanda, yani kasabamızın merkezinde yapılması ve bunu gerçekleştirecek bir rahip bulunması gerekir. Ne yazık ki ateş yağmuru, bu hükümdarın rahiplerinden pek çoğunun canını aldı. Bundandır ki bu hükümdarın kabilesi, yalnızca Kartal Tanrı ile Yıldızdoğan Gök Müjdecileri'nin merhameti için dua edebilir."
languages.original_text: "The ritual requires a site imbued with the powers of Quetza Temer — the heart of our village — and a priest to perform it. Alas, the fire-rain claimed many of this ruler's priests. And thus this ruler's tribe can only pray for the mercy of the Eagle-God and His Starborn Sky-Heralds."
